page.shortlink: api reporting namespace report data generate class

property.name: Name
property.description: Type "C". Name of report. String Name property

property.name: Source
property.description: Type "C". Source data definiton. String Source property

property.name: Calcs
property.description: Type "C". CR-LF separate list of Calcuated Field Definitons.

property.name: grand
property.description: Type "ReportDataGroup". Pointer to the top level JSON group.

property.name: Arguments
property.description: Type "SQL::Arguments". SQL Arguments to pass use during the generation of JSON data.

property.name: ExcelTemplate
property.description: Type "ReportExcelTemplate". Excel formatting template (expresses how to generate the excel).
